parameters.helmet: Percent of bike riders wearing helmets.
parameters.lunch: Percent of students receiving reduced-fee school lunches.

reference:
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(helmet, aes(x = lunch, y = helmet)) +
  geom_point()
title: Socioeconomic status and reduced-fee school lunches
description:
Description
Examining the relationship between socioeconomic status measured as the
percentage of children in a neighborhood receiving reduced-fee lunches at
school (lunch) and the percentage of bike riders in the neighborhood wearing
helmets (helmet).
format:
A data frame with 12 observations representing neighborhoods on the
following 2 variables.
